activate_account_button: CLICK HERE TO ACTIVATE YOUR ACCOUNT
min_password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password_uppercase_letter: Password must contain at least one uppercase character
password_lowercase_letter: Password must contain at least one lowercase character
password_numeric_char: Password must contain at least one numeric character
password_special_char: Password must contain at least one special character among @$.!-+
